greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of noncrossing partitions up to rotation of an n-set without singleton blocks.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := (b[n] + Sum[EulerPhi[n/d]*Coefficient[(1 + x + x^2)^d, x, d], {d, Most @ Divisors[n]}])/n;
program: b(n) = {polcoeff(serreverse((x - x^3) / (1 + x^3) + x * O(x*x^n)), n+1)}
a(n) = {if(n<1, n==0, (b(n) + sumdiv(n,d, if(d<n, eulerphi(n/d) * polcoeff((1 + x + x^2)^d, d))))/n)}
xref: Cf. A005043 (noncrossing partitions of an n-set without singleton blocks).
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Nov 16 2017
